tabs.label: Menu

items.name: MB’s Mussels
items.description:
PEI mussels seasoned with house-made Italian sausage, fresh basil, garlic,
and peppadew peppers, steamed in roasted tomato-white wine broth. MGF

items.name: Fritto Misto
items.description: Fried calamari, artichokes, pepperoncini, tomato sauce.

items.name: Prosciutto Wrapped Dates
items.description: Medjool dates, whipped goat cheese, peppered honey, lemon zest.

items.name: Bruschetta Dip
items.description: Oven roasted tomatoes, garlic, Calabrian pepper infused EVOO, fresh basil, stracciatella cheese.

items.name: Arancini
items.description: Fried risotto with parmesan and mozzarella, arrabbiata sauce and micro basil.

items.name: Charred Shishito Peppers
items.description: Sundried tomato, walnut, garlic, Parmesan, basil pesto

items.name: Soup di Giorno
items.description: Your server will inform you of the chef’s creation.

items.name: Wedge Salad
items.description:
Iceberg wedge, golden peppadews, roasted tomatoes, pancetta lardons, creamy gorgonzola dressing. MGF

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description:
Chopped romaine hearts, wood-grilled croutons, parmesan cheese, cracked pepper, creamy Caesar dressing. MGF

sections.title: Pasta

items.description: Red wine braised beef, carrots, celery, onion ragu, micro basil, paccheri pasta.

items.name: Chicken Parmigiana with Spicy Vodka Sauce

items.description: Organic chicken breast, roasted garlic mashed potatoes, grilled broccolini, Marsala and cremini mushroom sauce.

items.name: *Steak and Frites
items.description: Grilled New York strip, Gorgonzola cheese, sun-dried tomato butter, walnuts, fresh cut garlic fries.

items.name: Chopped Steak au Poivre

footnotes: *These items can be cooked to order. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
20% automatic gratuity will be added to parties of 8 or more.
